Articles.Content:
So I accepted a contract to complete a creature comfort mission from the station science mod on ksp 1.0.5. When I finalized the results the experiment reset within seconds and thus not completing the ' complete in orbit' sub contract.

 

I'm using ksp 1.0.5 and have no other major mods next to station science installed

Station science has not yet been updated to KSP 1.0.5. If you feel you completed the contract just use the cheat menu (Alt+F12) to complete it. There have been a few science bugs since the update (namely RemoteTech), I wouldn't be surprised if this mod has been affected too.
I use StationScience, and have not had this problem.  When I finalize the experiment, mine have not reset.
